subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The new car will be bigger and bulkier, a design intended to make the drivers’ environment safer and to reduce costs by requiring teams to build fewer cars for tracks of different sizes.
snippet: The new car will be bigger and bulkier, a design intended to make the drivers’ environment safer and to reduce costs by requiring teams to build fewer cars for tracks of different sizes.
